text:
Julian Burnlee Curry (8 December 1937 – 27 June 2020) was an English actor. He was best known for playing Claude Erskine-Browne in ITV's comedy-drama "Rumpole of the Bailey". He was born in Devon, England. He also played Wing Commander Shurlock in "Escape to Victory".
Curry died on 27 June 2020, aged 82.
